# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

::: {.cable-meta}
:::


TO: Richard Leavens
650 The Village No. 306
Redondo Beach, California 90278
Tel: 213-379-3705

Embassy has sent a telegram to Mr. Frank Albert Leavens at this mailing address in Sucre on Feb. 26, 1979, and a letter has been sent to his Casilla No. 6040 in La Paz. A note has also been left for him in the visitors mail box at the consular section. No answer has been received yet. Please provide additional information on subject, such as friends or relatives in Bolivia, phone number (if any) etc., which may facilitate our locating him.

American Embassy
La Paz, Bolivia
Boeker
